sentences.en: Do you know that you stink like a goat?
sentences.cn: 你知道自己臭得像头猪 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was aware of the stink of stale beer on his breath.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己嘴里有股变味啤酒的馊味。

sentences.en: How can new stockings stink? "
sentences.cn: 新袜子怎么会臭 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: I think their methods stink.
sentences.cn: 我认为他们的方法糟透了。

sentences.en: If I were you, I'd make a big stink.
sentences.cn: 如果我是你, 就闹个满城风雨.

sentences.en: It stinks in here!
sentences.cn: 这里很臭！

sentences.en: she's working like stink to get everything ready.
sentences.cn: 她正在非常卖力地工作，以使一切都准备就绪。

sentences.en: The family's making a hell of a stink.
sentences.cn: 这家人正在大吵大闹。

sentences.en: The place stinks of fried onions.
sentences.cn: 这地方有股难闻的炒洋葱味。

sentences.en: The room has awful stink.
sentences.cn: 那个房间散发着难闻的臭气.

sentences.en: The stink of the rotten fish turned my stomach.
sentences.cn: 腐烂的鱼臭味使我恶心.

sentences.en: The stink was fit to knock you down.
sentences.cn: 这臭味简直要把人熏倒。

sentences.en: The stink was overpowering.
sentences.cn: 臭味熏天。

sentences.en: The tabloid press kicked up a stink about his seven-day visit.
sentences.cn: 小报的报道引起民众对他为期7天的访问的强烈不满。

sentences.en: The toilets stank to high heaven (= stank very much ) .
sentences.cn: 那些厕所臭气熏天。

sentences.en: The window was closed and the stink was overpowering.
sentences.cn: 窗户关得严严的,房间里臭气熏天.

sentences.en: There was a big stink about his accepting a bribe.
sentences.cn: 他收受贿赂,引起一场大纠纷.

sentences.en: There's a stink of cats in here.
sentences.cn: 这里有猫的难闻气味.

sentences.en: They stink of money.
sentences.cn: 他们钞票多得发霉.

sentences.en: We all stank and nobody minded.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都很臭，所以也就没人在乎。

words.tran_cn: 发恶臭的；非常讨厌的；烂醉如泥的
散发出恶臭；名声臭（stink的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)非常卖力地；极强烈地

phrases.phrase: make a stink 或 raise a stink &I{【俚语】}

phrases.tran_cn: 发恶臭；散发出…的气味；[口]含有…的迹象（尤指不良的）

trans.tran_en: to have a strong and very unpleasant smell

trans.tran_cn: 散发出恶臭，招人厌恶，糟透
